  2. W.Y. Wang, B. An, Y.C. Jiang. Optimal Spot-Checking for Improving Evaluation Accuracy of Peer Grading Systems Proceedings of the 32nd AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI-18) New Orleans, USA, February 2-7, 2018.
